column4: any one know a good program i can run on linux for data recovery? i cannot access partitions on a drive (bad superblocks)
it's the whole drive, ext2, ext3, ntfs
not the whole drive, sorry, i have access to a swap partition on there
I think what he was looking for was a pastebin output of this command:  sudo fdisk -l /dev/drive (where drive is hdb or whereever it's located)
